DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the amount of voriconazole in the brain by fluorine-magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS) and to compare brain levels to plasma levels.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Voriconazole Penetration Into the Brain by Fluorine-Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteers 1855 years of age Subjects with any condition affecting drug absorption Subjects with a positive urine drug screen
